data.name: Cursed Broom
data.detailed_description:
Travel through young Maya's mundane hometown by mastering her newfound witch powers. Discover the origins of the Cursed Broom and reach the flying Witch City to start Maya's training.



  • Fly with a broom that doesn't quite work as advertised.
  • Explore the ups and downs of the city in 3 different levels.
  • Collect pages from a spellbook to prepare for Maya's studies.

data.short_description: Accompany Maya on her flight through this charming 2D platformer! Find your way through the different parts of Maya's mundane hometown, collect artifacts to gain different powers and see Maya embrace the spark of magic that has been sleeping inside of her.
